structure.unit: Sec. 12-3071. - REFUSAL TO ISSUE LICENSE WHEN APPLICANT IN VIOLATION OF LAW.

law.catch_line: REFUSAL TO ISSUE LICENSE WHEN APPLICANT IN VIOLATION OF LAW.
law.text: Any license provided for in this chapter may be denied on the recommendation of the City administration where the applicant is or would be in violation of any law. (Code 1959 , ยง4-46)
